StringTable.Label: Conquest_Description
StringTable.String: Aplastar a tus enemigos y dominar la galaxia!

StringTable.Label: Alliance_Description
StringTable.String: Utilice la diplomacia para llevar la paz a la galaxia.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Description
StringTable.String: No hay necesidad de luchar cuando su civilización es la mejor.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Description
StringTable.String: Reclamar Cristales de ascensión y ascender a un plano superior.

StringTable.Label: TurnLimit_Description
StringTable.String: Derrota a tus enemigos antes de que acabe el tiempo.

StringTable.Label: AllowSurrender_Description
StringTable.String: Sus enemigos lucharán hasta el último aliento.

StringTable.Label: BlindExploration_Description

StringTable.Label: MegaEvents_Description

StringTable.Label: ALFHA_WARNING_BUTTON_LABEL
StringTable.String: Work in progress, got it - let's go play space emperor!

StringTable.Label: CHOOSE_HOME_WORLD_TEXT
StringTable.String: This freighter is being launched from a shipyard with multiple sponsors. Choose its homeworld.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_ECONOMIC_STIMULUS_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Pumping out consumer goods from our factories encourages economic activity - and therefore the growth of our treasury.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_RESEARCH_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Dedicating all our manufacturing facilities to the cause of a particularly important research project greatly increases the efficiency of our scientists.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_CULTURAL_FESTIVAL_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: A planet-wide celebration of our culture, dedicated to spreading our influence across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_BIRTHING_SUBSIDIES_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: A new colony often needs help growing. By diverting our manufacturing resources to helping families secure their environments, we can make sure they grow and prosper.

StringTable.Label: ProjectCulling_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who cannot contribute are given a chance to prove themselves useful or perish. Our malevolent nature is reaffirmed by refusing to tolerate the weak putting a drain on society.

StringTable.Label: ProjectSanctuary_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicating the efforts of an entire world to finding those in need and helping them to become valuable members of society will surely increase our reputation for benevolence.

StringTable.Label: ProjectSummit_Dec
StringTable.String: Hosting a gathering where any ideas may be freely exchanged in search of greater truths makes any world to be known as a beacon of fairness and pragmatism.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_JUBILEE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: A planet-wide celebration meant to bring hope back to the overworked population; and raise the colony's approval.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_ASSEMBLY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Factories are more than a means of production, they are the nest we are born from and the womb of future generations.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_MILITARY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Allows a colony to funnel all its excess social manufacturing to its shipyard, when it no longer has Planetary Improvements to build or upgrade.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_MORAL_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Allows a colony to funnel its Social Manufacturing into boosting the morale of its population with free and cheaper goods and services.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_CONFIRM_MESSAGE

StringTable.Label: ATTACKER_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Good job, your invasion went great.

StringTable.Label: ATTACKER_FAILURE_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Ya blew it@ Your invasion has failed.

StringTable.Label: DEFENDER_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: You fended off the planetary invasion.

StringTable.Label: DESIGNER_LANDING_ALPHA_TEXT_LABEL
StringTable.String:
Aside from giving you all a shiny new toy to play with (thanks for your early support!), our ulterior motive for releasing this beta version of the ship designer to our founders is to find all the ways that players can break, slow down, or crash the game with user-designed ships. So please, post your results, feedback, and bug reports to the forums so we can improve subsequent builds.
CAVEATS + The user interface and available assets in this beta may change drastically before release. + Lighting and the rendering system in general are still being worked on. + Many of the more exciting features such as particles, custom parts, subsurface materials, and coloring are disabled for the beta. + Ships made in this beta may explode in future builds. + Only beta weapons and components are available for placement, and use placeholder graphics for the most part. + Custom ships on the starmap have not been optimized for rendering yet, so players will be able to crush the game's framerate if they go too crazy.

StringTable.Label: DESIGNER_LANDING_ALPHA_BUTTON_LABEL
StringTable.String: Warning given, now go crazy, post screenshots!

StringTable.Label: Turn_Limit_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: The player with the highest average percentage will win the game if no other victory type has been achieved.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Prove your military superiority by destroying or forcing the surrender of all the major races in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You must defeat %i remaining major races to achieve a conquest victory.

StringTable.Label: Tech_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Learn the keys to a higher plane of existence by unlocking the ultimate technologies.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Capture and study Precursor ascension crystals to learn the secret of ascending to a higher level of existence.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You have %i of the %i Aura points required to achieve an ascension victory.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Requirement_2_Label

StringTable.Label: Diplomatic_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Form a permanent alliance with all remaining major races, and bring true peace to the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Diplomatic_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You must ally with %i more races to achieve an alliance victory.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Convince the United Planets to elect you Supreme Leader of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: Approximately %i%% of the United Planets races are currently willing to vote for you as Supreme Leader.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: %i major races have defied the U.P. and must be destroyed to achieve a United Planets Victory.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Spread your cultural influence throughout %i%% of the galaxy, and become the unquestioned dominate culture.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: Your cultural influence must still gain control of %i%% of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_2_Label

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_FIRST_CONTACT
StringTable.String: Greetings, {LISTENERFACTION}. The {SPEAKERFACTION}'s Alpha A #1 duty at this time is to wipe you from the galaxy! Oh, but thanks for the hyperdrive. It will make hunting you down much easier.

StringTable.Label: WOMRHOLE_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Your fleet has been sucked into a womhole!

StringTable.Label: TECH_RESEARCH_DEFAULT_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Research technology to gain abilities and bonuses.

StringTable.Label: NEED_SHIPYARD_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Build a shipyard to access ship building.

StringTable.Label: PODS_EVENT_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Our scouts report that significant portions of the planet are inhabited by a sentient pod-like creature. These pods bond with other sentient life. Those who are bonded by these pods experience significant physical pain at all times, but have heightened intelligence. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: PODS_EVENT_BENEV_LABEL
StringTable.String: Keep our people away from those things. No one should have to live in agony.

StringTable.Label: PODS_EVENT_NEUTRAL_LABEL
StringTable.String: Encourage our people to make use of the pods, but don't force anyone.

StringTable.Label: PODS_EVENT_MERC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Excellent! Require all colonists to be 'introduced' to these pods!

StringTable.Label: SWAMPED_EVENT_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Upon landing on this world, you quickly realize that it has been inhabited before. Beneath the northern ice, explorers have found an ancient starship. They believe they can free the ship from the ice, but the resulting melt will flood much of the arable land on the planet, and the climate change will kill most of the unique native species.

StringTable.Label: SWAMPED_EVENT_BENEV_LABEL
StringTable.String: Leave the ship buried, but study its technology.

StringTable.Label: SWAMPED_EVENT_NEUTRAL_LABEL
StringTable.String: Set aside interior land to create refuges for the native species, then free the ship from the ice.

StringTable.Label: SWAMPED_EVENT_NEUTRAL_BONUS
StringTable.String: Free Precursor Ship, Population Cap -25%, Much of planet is flooded.

StringTable.Label: SWAMPED_EVENT_MERC_LABEL
StringTable.String: There's too much life in the universe as it is, and free ships are hard to come by.

StringTable.Label: SWAMPED_EVENT_MERC_BONUS
StringTable.String: Free Precursor Ship, Much of planet is flooded.

StringTable.Label: GOLDEN_AGE_EVENT_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: A golden age has dawned across the galaxy. Commerce is booming, the standard of living for citizens of all empires is increasing at an unparalleled rate, and tax revenues are beyond our rosiest projections. According to leading economic experts, this is the new normal and nothing could possibly go wrong. (+20% Economy)

StringTable.Label: SHADES_INFRARED_EVENT_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Several Archaeologists have uncovered an ancient novel, when translated it was revealed to be so erotic that the researchers quickly realized they could sell it and become rich beyond their wildest dreams. As expected the novel quickly became a Mega hit, and has now been published in every known language. Not so expected has been the recent spike in birth rates though the galaxy. (+50% Growth)

StringTable.Label: RUTHLESS_VISION_EVENT_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: While on a deep space survey, one of our ships has discovered an ancient artifact that can be used to enhance our targeting systems. Unfortunately works by tuning a sentient bean, to a living scionic sensor. The process is agonizing, and the existing personality of the "Volunteer" is completely destroyed. What should we do with the artifact?

StringTable.Label: RUTHLESS_VISION_EVENT_BENEV_LABEL
StringTable.String: Study the artifact as much as we can safely, and lock it away in the deepest valt in the empire.

StringTable.Label: RUTHLESS_VISION_EVENT_NEUTRAL_LABEL
StringTable.String: Use the artifact on convicted capital criminals, saving on expensive prison upkeep, and boosting our ability to defend ourselves in a dangerous galaxy.

StringTable.Label: RUTHLESS_VISION_EVENT_MERC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Forcibly Volunteer the least popular a crew member from each ship to undergo the transformation, giving them a chance to make something valuable of themselves.

StringTable.Label: OUTBREAK_EVENT_DESC_LABEL
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} has been overrun by a strange alien norovirus, it seam to kill 1 out of 20 citizens that are infected, but those who survive are significantly more intelligent. Our scientists have found the source of this outbreak, and how to cure it, but some wonder if we should use the unfortunate side effects to our advantage. How should we proceed?

StringTable.Label: OUTBREAK_EVENT_BENEV_LABEL
StringTable.String: Eradicate the Virus, one life lost is to many, regardless of the gain.

StringTable.Label: OUTBREAK_EVENT_NEUTRAL_LABEL
StringTable.String: Quarantine the planet, and immunize anyone who leaves, but allow volunteers to relocate there knowing the risk.

StringTable.Label: OUTBREAK_EVENT_NEUTRAL_BONUS
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +50% Research affected planet, -20% Growth on Affected Planet

StringTable.Label: OUTBREAK_EVENT_MERC_LABEL
StringTable.String: Never let a good Norovirus go to waste, immunize yourself and your friends, then spread the disease thought your colonies.

StringTable.Label: SnathiLostScoutAnomoly_Dec
StringTable.String: Upon reaching the Terran ship we have found that it is mostly intact. Our Scavenging crew has been able to get it up and running in a remarkably short time. It seems once the crew was dead, the energy field that had trapped it dissipated.

StringTable.Label: OutreachTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Benevolent civilizations believe that they can peacefully explore and colonize the galaxy, and Outreach gives them the tools they need to do it.

StringTable.Label: AffinityTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Through a profound affinity with their people and the races they encounter, benevolent civilizations can avoid almost all internal strife.

StringTable.Label: ProminenceTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Persuasion is one of the primary ways a benevolent civilization uses to resolve conflict with others and even expand their influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: EnlightenmentTier_Dec
StringTable.String: The Enlightenment of its citizens is always helpful to a benevolent civilization, helping them keep ahead of the less tolerant races of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AWETRAIT4_POPUP_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: This world has joined our empire!

StringTable.Label: STARTUP_DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT
StringTable.String:
The Drengin Empire is one of the older races in the galaxy, having survived and thrived over the millennia thanks to their unceasing brutality. Not mindlessly evil, as many races have discovered to their dismay, the Drengin are exceedingly clever and inventive in their application of evil. There are few ways to enslave or devour an alien that the Drengin haven't thought up.
Following the Dread Lord Wars, the Drengin were forced to put down an internal rebellion by a faction of Drengin called the Korath. That done, though not without cost, they remain one of the dominant species in the galaxy, along with their uneasy allies, the Yor.

StringTable.Label: STARTUP_TRAITSDESCRIPTION_DEFAULT
StringTable.String: Drengin soldiers are savagely effective in ground-based combat, and their naval vessels are famously tough. Their military manufacturing ability is also impressive, but Drengin colonies do sometimes struggle with discontent. Much of their famous inventiveness is put into stopping slaveling revolts.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: We've been attacked. We don't know by who, or what they want, but they're here. They want us dead. They want our land and our resources. We have to stop them, or lose everything.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: We've been attacked. We don't know by who, or what they want, but they're here. They want us dead. They want our land and our resources. We have to stop them, or lose everything.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_02_Description
StringTable.String: Our counter-offensive has begun. We attack their quadrant of space. Everything we have is headed there, and we want you to command our forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_02_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: Our counter-offensive has begun. We attack their quadrant of space. Everything we have is headed there, and we want you to command our forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_03_Description
StringTable.String: We're hearing news of an attack on our home worlds. Stop them at all costs.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_03_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: We're hearing news of an attack on our home worlds. Stop them at all costs.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_02_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: Simple standalone scenario to try your hand at defeating difficult forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_02_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: Simple standalone scenario to try your hand at defeating difficult forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_03_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: This is a long battle against multiple enemies in a large map. Actually, it isn't any of these things.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_03_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: This is a long battle against multiple enemies in a large map. Actually, it isn't any of these things.

StringTable.String: No human players available for this scenario.

StringTable.Label: CONVENTIONAL_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: This is war in its purest form, two forces fighting it out, often one-on-one in the streets. Not the easiest way to take a planet, but often the only way.

StringTable.Label: INFORMATION_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Very expensive, but useful if you want to preserve a planet intact and with a surviving population to keep things running.

StringTable.Label: BIOLOGICAL_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: When you only want the infrastructure but not all those troublesome inhabitants.

StringTable.Label: PLANETARY_BOMBARDMENT_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Very effective at softening up a planet's population, but can do a great deal of damage in the process.

StringTable.Label: TIDAL_DISRUPTION_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Expensive, but very effective against well defended planets. Can do some damage, but nothing that can't be repaired with time.

StringTable.Label: CORE_DETONATION_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: One of the most effective ways to take a planet, but also one of the most destructive. Not a great move for local tourism.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Behavior_Label
StringTable.String: Ship Role determines how this ship will behave in combat, and how it will interact with other ships in your fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Capital
StringTable.String: In battle, capital ships are the steel heart of your fleet. They will target any ship that comes in range, with the primary goal of cutting to the heart of the enemy fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Escort
StringTable.String: In battle, escorts will try to defend high-value ships like capital and support ships. If they have no assets to defend, they will target enemy ships, preferring medium threat ships like assault craft.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Assault
StringTable.String: In battle, assault craft are your sword. Their goal is to dive into the heart of a battle and take out the high-value, high-threat targets, such as capital ships.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Interceptor
StringTable.String: In battle, interceptors will try to seek out and destroy high-value, low fortitude targets, with the primary goal of taking out enemy support ships as quickly as possible.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Guardian
StringTable.String: In battle, guardians will try to defend low fortitude, high-value targets such as support ships. They will never surrender this duty as long as their charges remain.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Support
StringTable.String: In battle, support ships will attempt to stay out of combat. If armed, they will target any nearby threats, with a preference for low fortitude targets such as interceptors.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Starbase
StringTable.String: Starbases stay put and attempt to fight off any threats.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Upgrading
StringTable.String: Upgrading ships will stay put and attempt to fight off any threats.
